title: How to Change Age on YouTube: Step-By-Step Guide

steps.title: Open the YouTube app.
steps.content: Open the YouTube app. This looks like a white play button in a red box. If you aren't already signed into your account , tap Sign in in the top-right corner to do so now. Keep in mind the age change will reflect in Google and all other Google services.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. You can find this in the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: Tap Google Account.
steps.content: Tap Google Account . This will be underneath your YouTube handle.

steps.title: Tap Personal info.
steps.content: Tap Personal info . This is the tab between Home and Data & privacy .

steps.title: Tap Birthday.
steps.content: Tap Birthday . You can find this under the Basic info header.

steps.title: Enter a new birthday.
steps.content: Enter a new birthday. Tap the Month, Day, and/or Year fields to input a new birthday.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . This is the blue button. Your new birthday will be saved. You may not see this option if you have a restricted account or an account made by someone else . In this case, ask your parent, guardian, or admin to change this information for you if it's incorrect.

steps.title: Go to https://www.youtube.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.youtube.com/ in a web browser. If you aren't already logged into your YouTube account, click Sign in in the top-right corner to do so now. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click your profile picture.
steps.content: Click your profile picture. This is in the top-right corner. A drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Click Google Account.
steps.content: Click Google Account . This is at the top of the drop-down menu, underneath your YouTube handle. You'll be redirected to your Google settings.

steps.title: Click Personal info.
steps.content: Click Personal info . You can find this in the left panel.

steps.title: Click Birthday.
steps.content: Click Birthday . This is underneath the Basic info header.

steps.title: Enter a new birthday.
steps.content: Enter a new birthday. Click the Month, Day, and/or Year fields to input a new birthday.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . This is the blue button. Your new birthday will be saved.
